   21: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
   22: %%% Purpose: Test suite for the 'json' module.
   23: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
   24: 
   25: -module(json_SUITE).
   26: -include_lib("stdlib/include/assert.hrl").
   27: 
   28: %% Test server specific exports
   29: -export([all/0, suite/0, groups/0, init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2]).
   30: 
   31: %% Test cases must be exported.
   32: -export([
   33:     test_encode_atom/1,
   34:     test_encode_integer/1,
   35:     test_encode_float/1,
   36:     test_encode_binary/1,
   37:     test_encode_map/1,
   38:     test_encode_list/1,
   39:     test_encode_proplist/1,
   40:     test_encode_escape_all/1,
   41:     test_decode_atoms/1,
   42:     test_decode_numbers/1,
   43:     test_decode_strings/1,
   44:     test_decode_arrays/1,
   45:     test_decode_objects/1,
   46:     test_decode_whitespace/1,
   47:     test_decode_api/1,
   48:     test_decode_api_stream/1,
   49:     test_json_test_suite/1,
   50:     counterexamples/1,
   51:     property_string_roundtrip/1,
   52:     property_integer_roundtrip/1,
   53:     property_float_roundtrip/1,
   54:     property_object_roundtrip/1,
   55:     property_escape_all/1
   56: ]).
   57: 
   58: suite() ->
   59:     [
   60:         {ct_hooks, [ts_install_cth]},
   61:         {timetrap, {minutes, 4}}
   62:     ].
   63: 
   64: all() ->
   65:     [
   66:         {group, encode},
   67:         {group, decode},
   68:         test_json_test_suite,
   69:         {group, properties},
   70:         counterexamples
   71:     ].
   72: 
   73: groups() ->
   74:     [
   75:         {encode, [parallel], [
   76:             test_encode_atom,
   77:             test_encode_integer,
   78:             test_encode_float,
   79:             test_encode_binary,
   80:             test_encode_map,
   81:             test_encode_list,
   82:             test_encode_proplist,
   83:             test_encode_escape_all
   84:         ]},
   85:         {decode, [parallel], [
   86:             test_decode_atoms,
   87:             test_decode_numbers,
   88:             test_decode_strings,
   89:             test_decode_arrays,
   90:             test_decode_objects,
   91:             test_decode_whitespace,
   92:             test_decode_api,
   93:             test_decode_api_stream
   94:         ]},
   95:         {properties, [parallel], [
   96:             property_string_roundtrip,
   97:             property_integer_roundtrip,
   98:             property_float_roundtrip,
   99:             property_object_roundtrip,
  100:             property_escape_all
  101:         ]}
  102:     ].
  103: 
  104: init_per_group(properties, Config) ->
  105:     %% this works well in init_per_group as well as per suite
  106:     %% we only want to skip this group, if the tool is not found
  107:     ct_property_test:init_per_suite(Config);
  108: init_per_group(_, Config) ->
  109:     Config.
  110: 
  111: end_per_group(_, _Config) -> ok.
  112: 
  113: %%
  114: %% Encoding tests
  115: %%
  116: 
  117: test_encode_atom(_Config) ->
  118:     ?assertEqual(<<"true">>, encode(true)),
  119:     ?assertEqual(<<"false">>, encode(false)),
  120:     ?assertEqual(<<"null">>, encode(null)),
  121:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"json\"">>, encode(json)),
  122:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"‚òÉa\""/utf8>>, encode('‚òÉa')).
  123: 
  124: test_encode_integer(_Config) ->
  125:     ?assertEqual(<<"123">>, encode(123)),
  126:     ?assertEqual(<<"-123">>, encode(-123)),
  127:     ?assertEqual(<<"0">>, encode(0)).
  128: 
  129: test_encode_float(_Config) ->
  130:     ?assertEqual(<<"0.0">>, encode(0.0)),
  131:     ?assertEqual(<<"-0.0">>, encode(-0.0)),
  132:     ?assertEqual(<<"99.99">>, encode(99.99)),
  133:     ?assertEqual(<<"9.9e100">>, encode(9.9e100)),
  134:     ?assertEqual(<<"9.9e-100">>, encode(9.9e-100)).
  135: 
  136: test_encode_binary(_Config) ->
  137:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"hello world\"">>, encode(<<"hello world">>)),
  138:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"hello\\nworld\"">>, encode(<<"hello\nworld">>)),
  139:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"\\nhello\\nworld\\n\"">>, encode(<<"\nhello\nworld\n">>)),
  140: 
  141:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"\\\"\"">>, encode(<<"\"">>)),
  142:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"\\\\\"">>, encode(<<"\\">>)),
  143:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"\\b\"">>, encode(<<"\b">>)),
  144:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"\\f\"">>, encode(<<"\f">>)),
  145:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"\\n\"">>, encode(<<"\n">>)),
  146:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"\\r\"">>, encode(<<"\r">>)),
  147:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"\\t\"">>, encode(<<"\t">>)),
  148:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"\\u0000\"">>, encode(<<"\0">>)),
  149:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"\\u001F\"">>, encode(<<"\x1F">>)),
  150: 
  151:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"/\"">>, encode(<<"/">>)),
  152: 
  153:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"√°√©√≠√≥√∫√†√®√¨√≤√π√¢√™√Æ√¥√ª√£·∫Ωƒ©√µ≈©\""/utf8>>, encode(<<"√°√©√≠√≥√∫√†√®√¨√≤√π√¢√™√Æ√¥√ª√£·∫Ωƒ©√µ≈©"/utf8>>)),
  154:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"‚òÉa\""/utf8>>, encode(<<"‚òÉa"/utf8>>)),
  155: 
  156:     ?assertError({unsupported_type, <<0:1>>}, encode(<<0:1>>)),
  157: 
  158:     %% invalid 1st byte
  159:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xa0}, encode(<<"\xa0\xa1">>)),
  160: 
  161:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"\xc3\xb1\"">>, encode(<<"\xc3\xb1">>)),
  162:     %% invalid 2nd octet in 2-byte sequence
  163:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x28}, encode(<<"\xc3\x28">>)),
  164: 
  165:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"\xe2\x82\xa1\"">>, encode(<<"\xe2\x82\xa1">>)),
  166:     %% invalid 2nd octet in 3-byte sequence
  167:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x28}, encode(<<"\xe2\x28\xa1">>)),
  168:     %% invalid 3rd octet in 3-byte sequence
  169:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x28}, encode(<<"\xe2\x82\x28">>)),
  170: 
  171:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"\xf0\x90\x8c\xbc\"">>, encode(<<"\xf0\x90\x8c\xbc">>)),
  172:     %% invalid 2nd octet in 4-byte sequence
  173:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x28}, encode(<<"\xf0\x28\x8c\xbc">>)),
  174:     %% invalid 3rd octet in 4-byte sequence
  175:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x28}, encode(<<"\xf0\x90\x28\xbc">>)),
  176:     %% invalid 4th octet in 4-byte sequence
  177:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x28}, encode(<<"\xf0\x28\x8c\x28">>)),
  178: 
  179:     %% too-long sequences
  180:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xf8}, encode(<<"\xf8\xa1\xa1\xa1\xa1">>)),
  181:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xfc}, encode(<<"\xfc\xa1\xa1\xa1\xa1\xa1">>)),
  182: 
  183:     %% overlong
  184:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xc0}, encode(<<"\xc0\x80">>)),
  185:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x80}, encode(<<"\xe0\x80\x80">>)),
  186:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x80}, encode(<<"\xf0\x80\x80\x80">>)),
  187: 
  188:     %% surrogate halves
  189:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xa0}, encode(<<"\xed\xa0\x80">>)),
  190:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xaf}, encode(<<"\xed\xaf\xbf">>)),
  191:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xb0}, encode(<<"\xed\xb0\x80">>)),
  192:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xbf}, encode(<<"\xed\xbf\xbf">>)).
  193: 
  194: test_encode_escape_all(_Config) ->
  195:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"\\u2603a\"">>, encode_escape_all('‚òÉa')),
  196:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"\\u2603a\"">>, encode_escape_all(<<"‚òÉa"/utf8>>)),
  197:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"\\uD834\\uDD1Eb\"">>, encode_escape_all(<<"ùÑûb"/utf8>>)),
  198: 
  199:     %% because of how /utf8 works, we always report 1st byte as invalid
  200: 
  201:     %% invalid 1st byte
  202:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xa0}, encode_escape_all(<<"\xa0\xa1">>)),
  203: 
  204:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"\\u00F1\"">>, encode_escape_all(<<"\xc3\xb1">>)),
  205:     %% invalid 2nd octet in 2-byte sequence
  206:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xc3}, encode_escape_all(<<"\xc3\x28">>)),
  207: 
  208:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"\\u20A1\"">>, encode_escape_all(<<"\xe2\x82\xa1">>)),
  209:     %% invalid 2nd octet in 3-byte sequence
  210:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xe2}, encode_escape_all(<<"\xe2\x28\xa1">>)),
  211:     %% invalid 3rd octet in 3-byte sequence
  212:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xe2}, encode_escape_all(<<"\xe2\x82\x28">>)),
  213: 
  214:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"\\uD800\\uDF3C\"">>, encode_escape_all(<<"\xf0\x90\x8c\xbc">>)),
  215:     %% invalid 2nd octet in 4-byte sequence
  216:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xf0}, encode_escape_all(<<"\xf0\x28\x8c\xbc">>)),
  217:     %% invalid 3rd octet in 4-byte sequence
  218:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xf0}, encode_escape_all(<<"\xf0\x90\x28\xbc">>)),
  219:     %% invalid 4th octet in 4-byte sequence
  220:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xf0}, encode_escape_all(<<"\xf0\x28\x8c\x28">>)),
  221: 
  222:     %% too-long sequences
  223:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xf8}, encode_escape_all(<<"\xf8\xa1\xa1\xa1\xa1">>)),
  224:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xfc}, encode_escape_all(<<"\xfc\xa1\xa1\xa1\xa1\xa1">>)),
  225: 
  226:     %% overlong
  227:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xc0}, encode_escape_all(<<"\xc0\x80">>)),
  228:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xe0}, encode_escape_all(<<"\xe0\x80\x80">>)),
  229:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xf0}, encode_escape_all(<<"\xf0\x80\x80\x80">>)),
  230: 
  231:     %% surrogate halves
  232:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xed}, encode_escape_all(<<"\xed\xa0\x80">>)),
  233:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xed}, encode_escape_all(<<"\xed\xaf\xbf">>)),
  234:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xed}, encode_escape_all(<<"\xed\xb0\x80">>)),
  235:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xed}, encode_escape_all(<<"\xed\xbf\xbf">>)).
  236: 
  237: test_encode_map(_Config) ->
  238:     ?assertEqual(<<"{}">>, encode(#{})),
  239:     ?assertEqual(<<"{\"foo\":\"bar\"}">>, encode(#{<<"foo">> => <<"bar">>})),
  240:     ?assertEqual(<<"{\"foo\":\"bar\"}">>, encode(#{foo => bar})),
  241:     ?assertEqual(<<"{\"42\":\"bar\"}">>, encode(#{42 => bar})),
  242:     ?assertEqual(<<"{\"foo\":\"bar\"}">>, encode_checked(#{<<"foo">> => <<"bar">>})),
  243:     ?assertEqual(<<"{\"foo\":\"bar\"}">>, encode_checked(#{foo => bar})),
  244:     ?assertEqual(<<"{\"42\":\"bar\"}">>, encode_checked(#{42 => bar})),
  245: 
  246:     MultiKeyMap = #{<<"foo">> => <<"foo1">>, foo => <<"foo2">>},
  247:     ?assertError({duplicate_key, <<"foo">>}, encode_checked(MultiKeyMap)),
  248:     ?assertEqual(<<"{\"foo\":\"foo2\",\"foo\":\"foo1\"}">>, encode(MultiKeyMap)).
  249: 
  250: test_encode_list(_Config) ->
  251:     ?assertEqual(<<"[]">>, encode([])),
  252:     ?assertEqual(<<"[1,2,3]">>, encode([1, 2, 3])).
  253: 
  254: test_encode_proplist(_Config) ->
  255:     ?assertError({unsupported_type, {a, 1}}, encode([{a, 1}])),
  256:     ?assertEqual(<<"{\"a\":1}">>, encode_proplist([{a, 1}])),
  257:     ?assertEqual(<<"{\"a\":1}">>, encode_proplist_checked([{a, 1}])),
  258: 
  259:     MultiKeyProplist = [{<<"foo">>, <<"foo1">>}, {foo, <<"foo2">>}],
  260:     ?assertError({duplicate_key, foo}, encode_proplist_checked(MultiKeyProplist)),
  261:     ?assertEqual(<<"{\"foo\":\"foo1\",\"foo\":\"foo2\"}">>, encode_proplist(MultiKeyProplist)).
  262: 
  263: encode(Term) -> iolist_to_binary(json:encode(Term)).
  264: 
  265: encode_escape_all(Term) ->
  266:     Encode = fun
  267:         (Binary, _) when is_binary(Binary) -> json:encode_binary_escape_all(Binary);
  268:         (Other, Encode) -> json:encode_value(Other, Encode)
  269:     end,
  270:     iolist_to_binary(json:encode(Term, Encode)).
  271: 
  272: encode_checked(Term) ->
  273:     Encode = fun
  274:         (Map, Encode) when is_map(Map) -> json:encode_map_checked(Map, Encode);
  275:         (Other, Encode) -> json:encode_value(Other, Encode)
  276:     end,
  277:     iolist_to_binary(json:encode(Term, Encode)).
  278: 
  279: encode_proplist(Term) ->
  280:     Encode = fun
  281:         ([{_, _} | _], Encode) -> json:encode_key_value_list(Term, Encode);
  282:         (Other, Encode) -> json:encode_value(Other, Encode)
  283:     end,
  284:     iolist_to_binary(json:encode(Term, Encode)).
  285: 
  286: encode_proplist_checked(Term) ->
  287:     Encode = fun
  288:         ([{_, _} | _], Encode) -> json:encode_key_value_list_checked(Term, Encode);
  289:         (Other, Encode) -> json:encode_value(Other, Encode)
  290:     end,
  291:     iolist_to_binary(json:encode(Term, Encode)).
  292: 
  293: %%
  294: %% Decoding tests
  295: %%
  296: 
  297: test_decode_atoms(_Config) ->
  298:     ?assertEqual(true, decode(<<"true">>)),
  299:     ?assertEqual(false, decode(<<"false">>)),
  300:     ?assertEqual(null, decode(<<"null">>)).
  301: 
  302: test_decode_numbers(_Config) ->
  303:     ?assertError(unexpected_end, decode(<<"-">>)),
  304:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $-}, decode(<<"--1">>)),
  305:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $1}, json:decode(<<"01">>)),
  306:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $.}, decode(<<".1">>)),
  307:     ?assertError(unexpected_end, decode(<<"1.">>)),
  308:     ?assertError(unexpected_end, decode(<<"1e">>)),
  309:     ?assertError(unexpected_end, decode(<<"1.0e+">>)),
  310:     ?assertError({unexpected_sequence, <<"1.0e999">>}, decode(<<"1e999">>)),
  311: 
  312:     ?assertEqual(0, decode(<<"0">>)),
  313:     ?assertEqual(1, decode(<<"1">>)),
  314:     ?assertEqual(0, decode(<<"-0">>)),
  315:     ?assertEqual(-1, decode(<<"-1">>)),
  316:     ?assertEqual(0.0, decode(<<"0.0">>)),
  317:     ?assertEqual(-0.0, decode(<<"-0.0">>)),
  318:     ?assertEqual(0.1, decode(<<"0.1">>)),
  319:     ?assertEqual(-0.1, decode(<<"-0.1">>)),
  320:     ?assertEqual(0.0, decode(<<"0e0">>)),
  321:     ?assertEqual(0.0, decode(<<"0E0">>)),
  322:     ?assertEqual(1.0, decode(<<"1e0">>)),
  323:     ?assertEqual(1.0, decode(<<"1E0">>)),
  324:     ?assertEqual(1.0, decode(<<"1.0e0">>)),
  325:     ?assertEqual(1.0, decode(<<"1e+0">>)),
  326:     ?assertEqual(1.0, decode(<<"1.0e+0">>)),
  327:     ?assertEqual(0.1e1, decode(<<"0.1e1">>)),
  328:     ?assertEqual(0.1e-1, decode(<<"0.1e-1">>)),
  329:     ?assertEqual(99.99e99, decode(<<"99.99e99">>)),
  330:     ?assertEqual(-99.99e-99, decode(<<"-99.99e-99">>)),
  331:     ?assertEqual(123456789.123456789e123, decode(<<"123456789.123456789e123">>)).
  332: 
  333: test_decode_strings(_Config) ->
  334:     ?assertError(unexpected_end, decode(<<"\"">>)),
  335:     ?assertError(unexpected_end, decode(<<"\"\\\"">>)),
  336:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $k}, decode(<<"\"\\k\"">>)),
  337:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\r}, decode(<<"\"a\r\"">>)),
  338:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x80}, decode(<<"\"\x80\"">>)),
  339:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x1F}, decode(<<"\"\x1F\"">>)),
  340:     ?assertError(unexpected_end, decode(<<"\"\\u2603\\\"">>)),
  341:     ?assertError(unexpected_end, decode(<<"\"Here's a snowman for you: ‚òÉ. Good day!"/utf8>>)),
  342:     ?assertError(unexpected_end, decode(<<"\"ùÑû"/utf8>>)),
  343:     ?assertError({unexpected_sequence, <<"\\ud8aa\\udcxx">>}, decode(<<"\"\\ud8aa\\udcxx\"">>)),
  344:     ?assertError({unexpected_sequence, <<"\\ud8aa\\uda00">>}, decode(<<"\"\\ud8aa\\uda00\"">>)),
  345:     ?assertError({unexpected_sequence, <<"\\uxxxx">>}, decode(<<"\"\\uxxxx\"">>)),
  346: 
  347:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"\\/\b\f\n\r\t">>, decode(<<"\"\\\"\\\\\\/\\b\\f\\n\\r\\t\"">>)),
  348:     ?assertEqual(<<"‚òÉ"/utf8>>, decode(<<"\"\\u2603\"">>)),
  349:     ?assertEqual(<<"\x{2028}\x{2029}"/utf8>>, decode(<<"\"\\u2028\\u2029\"">>)),
  350:     ?assertEqual(<<"ùÑû"/utf8>>, decode(<<"\"\\uD834\\uDD1E\"">>)),
  351:     ?assertEqual(<<"ùÑû"/utf8>>, decode(<<"\"\\ud834\\udd1e\"">>)),
  352:     ?assertEqual(<<"ÌûôÌûô"/utf8>>, decode(<<"\"\\uD799\\uD799\"">>)),
  353:     ?assertEqual(<<"‚úî"/utf8>>, decode(<<"\"‚úî\""/utf8>>)),
  354: 
  355:     %% test-case with & without \n to test copying & non-copying implementation
  356: 
  357:     %% invalid 1st byte
  358:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xa0}, decode(<<"\"\xa0\xa1\"">>)),
  359:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xa0}, decode(<<"\"\\n\xa0\xa1\"">>)),
  360: 
  361:     ?assertEqual(<<"\xc3\xb1">>, decode(<<"\"\xc3\xb1\"">>)),
  362:     ?assertEqual(<<"\n\xc3\xb1">>, decode(<<"\"\\n\xc3\xb1\"">>)),
  363:     %% invalid 2nd octet in 2-byte sequence
  364:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x28}, decode(<<"\"\xc3\x28\"">>)),
  365:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x28}, decode(<<"\"\\n\xc3\x28\"">>)),
  366: 
  367:     ?assertEqual(<<"\xe2\x82\xa1">>, decode(<<"\"\xe2\x82\xa1\"">>)),
  368:     ?assertEqual(<<"\n\xe2\x82\xa1">>, decode(<<"\"\\n\xe2\x82\xa1\"">>)),
  369:     %% invalid 2nd octet in 3-byte sequence
  370:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x28}, decode(<<"\"\xe2\x28\xa1\"">>)),
  371:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x28}, decode(<<"\"\\n\xe2\x28\xa1\"">>)),
  372:     %% invalid 3rd octet in 3-byte sequence
  373:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x28}, decode(<<"\"\xe2\x82\x28\"">>)),
  374:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x28}, decode(<<"\"\\n\xe2\x82\x28\"">>)),
  375: 
  376:     ?assertEqual(<<"\xf0\x90\x8c\xbc">>, decode(<<"\"\xf0\x90\x8c\xbc\"">>)),
  377:     ?assertEqual(<<"\n\xf0\x90\x8c\xbc">>, decode(<<"\"\\n\xf0\x90\x8c\xbc\"">>)),
  378:     %% invalid 2nd octet in 4-byte sequence
  379:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x28}, decode(<<"\"\xf0\x28\x8c\xbc\"">>)),
  380:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x28}, decode(<<"\"\\n\xf0\x28\x8c\xbc\"">>)),
  381:     %% invalid 3rd octet in 4-byte sequence
  382:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x28}, decode(<<"\"\xf0\x90\x28\xbc\"">>)),
  383:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x28}, decode(<<"\"\\n\xf0\x90\x28\xbc\"">>)),
  384:     %% invalid 4th octet in 4-byte sequence
  385:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x28}, decode(<<"\"\xf0\x28\x8c\x28\"">>)),
  386:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x28}, decode(<<"\"\\n\xf0\x28\x8c\x28\"">>)),
  387: 
  388:     %% too-long sequences
  389:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xf8}, decode(<<"\"\xf8\xa1\xa1\xa1\xa1\"">>)),
  390:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xf8}, decode(<<"\"\\n\xf8\xa1\xa1\xa1\xa1\"">>)),
  391:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xfc}, decode(<<"\"\xfc\xa1\xa1\xa1\xa1\xa1\"">>)),
  392:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xfc}, decode(<<"\"\\n\xfc\xa1\xa1\xa1\xa1\xa1\"">>)),
  393: 
  394:     %% overlong
  395:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xc0}, decode(<<"\"\xc0\x80\"">>)),
  396:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xc0}, decode(<<"\"\\n\xc0\x80\"">>)),
  397:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x80}, decode(<<"\"\xe0\x80\x80\"">>)),
  398:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x80}, decode(<<"\"\\n\xe0\x80\x80\"">>)),
  399:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x80}, decode(<<"\"\xf0\x80\x80\x80\"">>)),
  400:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x80}, decode(<<"\"\\n\xf0\x80\x80\x80\"">>)),
  401: 
  402:     %% surrogate halves
  403:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xa0}, decode(<<"\"\xed\xa0\x80\"">>)),
  404:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xa0}, decode(<<"\"\\n\xed\xa0\x80\"">>)),
  405:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xaf}, decode(<<"\"\xed\xaf\xbf\"">>)),
  406:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xaf}, decode(<<"\"\\n\xed\xaf\xbf\"">>)),
  407:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xb0}, decode(<<"\"\xed\xb0\x80\"">>)),
  408:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xb0}, decode(<<"\"\\n\xed\xb0\x80\"">>)),
  409:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xbf}, decode(<<"\"\xed\xbf\xbf\"">>)).
  410: 
  411: test_decode_arrays(_Config) ->
  412:     ?assertError(unexpected_end, decode(<<"[">>)),
  413:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $,}, decode(<<"[,">>)),
  414:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $]}, decode(<<" ]">>)),
  415:     ?assertError(unexpected_end, decode(<<"[1,">>)),
  416: 
  417:     ?assertEqual([], decode(<<"[]">>)),
  418:     ?assertEqual([1, 2, 3], decode(<<"[1,2,3]">>)),
  419:     ?assertEqual([<<"foo">>, <<"bar">>, <<"baz">>], decode(<<"[\"foo\", \"bar\", \"baz\"]">>)),
  420:     ?assertEqual([#{<<"foo">> => <<"bar">>}], decode(<<"[{\"foo\":\"bar\"}]">>)).
  421: 
  422: test_decode_objects(_Config) ->
  423:     ?assertError(unexpected_end, decode(<<"{">>)),
  424:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $,}, decode(<<"{,">>)),
  425:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $}}, decode(<<"{\"foo\"}">>)),
  426:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $}}, decode(<<"{\"foo\":}">>)),
  427:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $}}, decode(<<"{\"foo\":1,}">>)),
  428: 
  429:     ?assertEqual(#{}, decode(<<"{}">>)),
  430:     ?assertEqual(#{<<"foo">> => <<"bar">>}, decode(<<"{\"foo\": \"bar\"}">>)),
  431:     ?assertEqual(#{<<"foo">> => <<"bar">>}, decode(<<"{\"foo\" : \"bar\"}">>)),
  432:     ?assertEqual(#{<<"foo">> => #{}}, decode(<<"{\"foo\":{}}">>)),
  433:     ?assertEqual(#{<<"foo">> => []}, decode(<<"{\"foo\":[]}">>)),
  434:     ?assertEqual(#{<<"foo">> => 1, <<"bar">> => 2}, decode(<<"{\"foo\":1,\"bar\":2}">>)).
  435: 
  436: test_decode_whitespace(_Config) ->
  437:     ?assertError(unexpected_end, decode(<<"">>)),
  438:     ?assertError(unexpected_end, decode(ews(<<" ">>))),
  439: 
  440:     ?assertEqual([], decode(ews(<<" [ ] ">>))),
  441:     ?assertEqual(#{}, decode(ews(<<" { } ">>))),
  442:     ?assertEqual([1, 2], decode(ews(<<" [ 1 , 2 ] ">>))),
  443:     ?assertEqual(#{<<"foo">> => 1, <<"bar">> => 2}, decode(ews(<<" { \"foo\" : 1 , \"bar\" : 2 } ">>))).
  444: 
  445: %% add extra whitespace
  446: ews(Str) ->
  447:     unicode:characters_to_binary(string:replace(Str, <<" ">>, <<" \s\t\r\n">>)).
  448: 
  449: test_decode_api(_Config) ->
  450:     put(history, []),
  451:     ArrayStart = set_history1(array_start, fun({_, Int}) ->
  452:         {[], Int + 1}
  453:     end),
  454:     ArrayPush = set_history2(array_push, fun(Val, {Acc, Int}) ->
  455:         {[Val | Acc], Int + 1}
  456:     end),
  457:     ArrayFinish = set_history2(array_finish, fun({Acc, Int}, {OldAcc, _OldInt}) ->
  458:         {lists:reverse(Acc), {OldAcc, Int + 1}}
  459:     end),
  460:     ObjectStart = set_history1(object_start, fun({_, Int}) ->
  461:         {[], Int + 1}
  462:     end),
  463:     ObjectPush = set_history3(object_push, fun(Key, Val, {Acc, Int}) ->
  464:         {[{Key, Val} | Acc], Int + 1}
  465:     end),
  466:     ObjectFinish = set_history2(object_finish, fun({Acc, Int}, {OldAcc, _OldInt}) ->
  467:         {maps:from_list(Acc), {OldAcc, Int + 1}}
  468:     end),
  469:     Float = set_history1(float, fun binary_to_float/1),
  470:     Integer = set_history1(integer, fun binary_to_integer/1),
  471:     String = set_history1(string, fun binary_to_atom/1),
  472:     Decoders = #{
  473:         array_start => ArrayStart,
  474:         array_push => ArrayPush,
  475:         array_finish => ArrayFinish,
  476:         object_start => ObjectStart,
  477:         object_push => ObjectPush,
  478:         object_finish => ObjectFinish,
  479:         float => Float,
  480:         integer => Integer,
  481:         string => String,
  482:         null => nil
  483:     },
  484: 
  485:     Data = <<"{\"a\": [[], {}, true, false, null, {\"foo\": \"baz\"}], \"b\": [1, 2.0, \"three\"]}">>,
  486:     {Decoded, Acc, <<>>} = json:decode(Data, {[], 0}, Decoders),
  487:     ?assertEqual({[], 24}, Acc),
  488:     Expected = #{a => [[], #{}, true, false, nil, #{foo => baz}], b => [1, 2.0, three]},
  489:     ?assertEqual(Expected, Decoded),
  490:     ExpectedHistory =
  491:         [
  492:             {object_start, {[], 0}, {[], 1}},
  493:             {string, <<"a">>, a},
  494:             {array_start, {[], 1}, {[], 2}},
  495:             {array_start, {[], 2}, {[], 3}},
  496:             {array_finish, {{[], 3}, {[], 2}}, {[], {[], 4}}},
  497:             {array_push, {[], {[], 4}}, {[[]], 5}},
  498:             {object_start, {[[]], 5}, {[], 6}},
  499:             {object_finish, {{[], 6}, {[[]], 5}}, {#{}, {[[]], 7}}},
  500:             {array_push, {#{}, {[[]], 7}}, {[#{}, []], 8}},
  501:             {array_push, {true, {[#{}, []], 8}}, {[true, #{}, []], 9}},
  502:             {array_push, {false, {[true, #{}, []], 9}}, {[false, true, #{}, []], 10}},
  503:             {array_push, {nil, {[false, true, #{}, []], 10}}, {[nil, false, true, #{}, []], 11}},
  504:             {object_start, {[nil, false, true, #{}, []], 11}, {[], 12}},
  505:             {string, <<"foo">>, foo},
  506:             {string, <<"baz">>, baz},
  507:             {object_push, {foo, baz, {[], 12}}, {[{foo, baz}], 13}},
  508:             {object_finish, {{[{foo, baz}], 13}, {[nil, false, true, #{}, []], 11}},
  509:                 {#{foo => baz}, {[nil, false, true, #{}, []], 14}}},
  510:             {array_push, {#{foo => baz}, {[nil, false, true, #{}, []], 14}}, {
  511:                 [#{foo => baz}, nil, false, true, #{}, []], 15
  512:             }},
  513:             {array_finish, {{[#{foo => baz}, nil, false, true, #{}, []], 15}, {[], 1}},
  514:                 {[[], #{}, true, false, nil, #{foo => baz}], {[], 16}}},
  515:             {object_push, {a, [[], #{}, true, false, nil, #{foo => baz}], {[], 16}}, {
  516:                 [{a, [[], #{}, true, false, nil, #{foo => baz}]}], 17
  517:             }},
  518:             {string, <<"b">>, b},
  519:             {array_start, {[{a, [[], #{}, true, false, nil, #{foo => baz}]}], 17}, {[], 18}},
  520:             {integer, <<"1">>, 1},
  521:             {array_push, {1, {[], 18}}, {[1], 19}},
  522:             {float, <<"2.0">>, 2.0},
  523:             {array_push, {2.0, {[1], 19}}, {[2.0, 1], 20}},
  524:             {string, <<"three">>, three},
  525:             {array_push, {three, {[2.0, 1], 20}}, {[three, 2.0, 1], 21}},
  526:             {array_finish, {{[three, 2.0, 1], 21}, {[{a, [[], #{}, true, false, nil, #{foo => baz}]}], 17}},
  527:                 {[1, 2.0, three], {[{a, [[], #{}, true, false, nil, #{foo => baz}]}], 22}}},
  528:             {object_push, {b, [1, 2.0, three], {[{a, [[], #{}, true, false, nil, #{foo => baz}]}], 22}}, {
  529:                 [{b, [1, 2.0, three]}, {a, [[], #{}, true, false, nil, #{foo => baz}]}], 23
  530:             }},
  531:             {object_finish, {{[{b, [1, 2.0, three]}, {a, [[], #{}, true, false, nil, #{foo => baz}]}], 23}, {[], 0}},
  532:                 {#{a => [[], #{}, true, false, nil, #{foo => baz}], b => [1, 2.0, three]}, {[], 24}}}
  533:         ],
  534:     ?assertEqual(ExpectedHistory, lists:reverse(get(history))).
  535: 
  536: set_history1(Ty, Fun) ->
  537:     fun(Arg) -> set_history(Ty, Arg, Fun(Arg)) end.
  538: 
  539: set_history2(Ty, Fun) ->
  540:     fun(Arg1, Arg2) -> set_history(Ty, {Arg1, Arg2}, Fun(Arg1, Arg2)) end.
  541: 
  542: set_history3(Ty, Fun) ->
  543:     fun(Arg1, Arg2, Arg3) -> set_history(Ty, {Arg1, Arg2, Arg3}, Fun(Arg1, Arg2, Arg3)) end.
  544: 
  545: set_history(Ty, Acc, Res) ->
  546:     History = get(history),
  547:     Entry = {Ty, Acc, Res},
  548:     put(history, [Entry | History]),
  549:     Res.
  550: 
  551: test_decode_api_stream(_Config) ->
  552:     Types = ~#{"types": [[], {}, true, false, null, {"foo": "baz"}],
  553:                "numbers": [1, -10, 0.0, -0.0, 2.0, -2.0, 31e2, 31e-2, 0.31e2, -0.31e2, 0.13e-2],
  554:                "strings": ["three", "√•√§√∂", "mixed_Œ©"],
  555:                "escaped": ["\\n", "\\u2603", "\\ud834\\uDD1E", "\\n\xc3\xb1"]
  556:               }#,
  557:     ok = stream_decode(Types),
  558: 
  559:     Multiple = ~#12345 1.30 "String1" -0.31e2\n["an array"]12345#,
  560:     ok = multi_stream_decode(Multiple),
  561:     ok.
  562: 
  563: 
  564: decode(Bin) ->
  565:     try json:decode(Bin) of
  566:         Result ->
  567:             {Res, [], <<>>} = byte_loop(Bin),
  568:             ?assertEqual(Result, Res, "Stream decode failed"),
  569:             Result
  570:     catch Class:Reason:ST ->
  571:             ?assertError(Reason, byte_loop(Bin)),
  572:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, ST)
  573:     end.
  574: 
  575: stream_decode(Str) ->
  576:     {R1, [], <<>>} = byte_loop(Str),
  577:     case json:decode(Str) of
  578:         R1 ->
  579:             ok;
  580:         R2 ->
  581:             io:format("~p ~p~n",[R1,R2]),
  582:             error
  583:     end.
  584: 
  585: multi_stream_decode(<<>>) ->
  586:     ok;
  587: multi_stream_decode(Strs) ->
  588:     {R1, [], ContBin} = byte_loop(Strs),
  589:     case json:decode(Strs, [], #{}) of
  590:         {R1, [], ContBin} ->
  591:             multi_stream_decode(ContBin);
  592:         Other ->
  593:             io:format("~p '~ts'~n~p~n", [R1,ContBin, Other]),
  594:             error
  595:     end.
  596: 
  597: byte_loop(Bin) ->
  598:     {continue, State} = json:decode_start(<<>>, [], #{}),
  599:     byte_loop(Bin, State, []).
  600: 
  601: byte_loop(<<Byte, Rest/binary>>, State0, Bytes) ->
  602:     %% io:format("cont with '~s'  ~p~n",[lists:reverse([Byte|Bytes]), State0]),
  603:     case json:decode_continue(<<Byte>>, State0) of
  604:         {continue, State} ->
  605:             byte_loop(Rest, State, [Byte|Bytes]);
  606:         {Result, [], <<>>} ->
  607:             %% trim to match the binary in return value
  608:             {Result, [], string:trim(Rest, leading)}
  609:     end;
  610: byte_loop(<<>>, State, _Bytes) ->
  611:     json:decode_continue(end_of_input, State).
  612: 
  613: %%
  614: %% JSON SUITE tests
  615: %%
  616: 
  617: test_json_test_suite(Config) ->
  618:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  619:     TestFiles = filelib:wildcard("*.json", DataDir),
  620:     Checker = fun(File) ->
  621:         Type = test_type(File),
  622:         {ok, Data} = file:read_file(filename:join(DataDir, File)),
  623:         test_file(Type, File, Data)
  624:     end,
  625:     lists:foreach(Checker, TestFiles).
  626: 
  627: test_type("y_" ++ _) -> yes;
  628: test_type("n_" ++ _) -> no;
  629: test_type("i_number_double_huge_neg_exp.json") -> yes;
  630: test_type("i_number_real_underflow.json") -> yes;
  631: test_type("i_number_too_big_neg_int.json") -> yes;
  632: test_type("i_number_too_big_pos_int.json") -> yes;
  633: test_type("i_number_very_big_negative_int.json") -> yes;
  634: test_type("i_structure_500_nested_arrays.json") -> yes;
  635: test_type("i_" ++ _) -> no.
  636: 
  637: test_file(yes, File, Data) ->
  638:     Parsed = decode(Data),
  639:     ?assertEqual(Parsed, decode(iolist_to_binary(encode(Parsed))), File);
  640: test_file(no, File, Data) ->
  641:     ?assertError(_, decode(Data), File).
  642: 
  643: %%
  644: %% Property tests
  645: %%
  646: 
  647: property_string_roundtrip(Config) ->
  648:     ct_property_test:quickcheck(json_prop:prop_string_roundtrip(), Config).
  649: 
  650: property_integer_roundtrip(Config) ->
  651:     ct_property_test:quickcheck(json_prop:prop_integer_roundtrip(), Config).
  652: 
  653: property_float_roundtrip(Config) ->
  654:     ct_property_test:quickcheck(json_prop:prop_float_roundtrip(), Config).
  655: 
  656: property_object_roundtrip(Config) ->
  657:     ct_property_test:quickcheck(json_prop:prop_object_roundtrip(), [{numtests, 250} | Config]).
  658: 
  659: property_escape_all(Config) ->
  660:     ct_property_test:quickcheck(json_prop:prop_escape_all(), Config).
  661: 
  662: counterexamples(_Config) ->
  663:     Value = [[], 0],
  664:     ?assertEqual(Value, decode_io(encode(Value))).
  665: 
  666: decode_io(IOList) -> decode(iolist_to_binary(IOList)).
